message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $120. I think it's a great value and I'm confident you'll love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I'm afraid I can't meet you at $90. I'm willing to make a compromise, how about we meet at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $95? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about we meet at $105?
